ch0114_00_natsume/0101_0701_01_10:
Aha, there you are!
I had a feeling I’d be seeing you soon!
ch0114_00_natsume/0101_0701_02_10:
My powers are at your disposal,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...if you want my help,
that is.
ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0701_01_10:
A lot of people think my psychic powers are
just part of my everyday life.
ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0701_03_10:
Honestly, it’s very difficult to control my powers.
I can lose the sense for it quite easily if I don’t
train every day.
ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0701_04_10:
I guess it’s similar to Pokémon battles.
Both require daily training.
ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0702_01_10: It’s difficult to maintain immense power...
ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0702_02_10: And I’m not only talking about psychic powers.
ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_01_10:
Alakazam is so intelligent that he can solve any
problem immediately—no matter how difficult
it is.
ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_02_10:
However, he never tells me the answer whenever
I’m struggling with something.
ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_03_10:
He must know that in those cases, staying silent
is the best thing to do.
ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_04_10:
Because if we don’t find our own answers to
our problems, we’ll never grow.
ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0702_01_10:
Alakazam is very smart and has powerful
psychic abilities.
ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0702_02_10:
I have to keep training so that I stay worthy of
being his partner.
ch0114_00_natsume/0603_0701_02_10:
So even if you have the gift of precognition, that
doesn’t mean you can win every Pokémon battle.
ch0114_00_natsume/0603_0701_03_10: That’s what makes them so interesting, though.
ch0114_00_natsume/0603_0702_02_10:
That’s probably because you’re filled with so many
different possibilities.
ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0701_01_10:
A long time ago, I battled the Fighting Dojo to
make mine the official Gym of Saffron City.
ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0701_02_10:
I ultimately won, but they were very
strong opponents.
ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0701_03_10:
I even saw a glimpse of a future where I
would lose.
ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0702_02_10:
But there are times, like with the Fighting Dojo,
where I can’t avoid a conflict.
ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0702_03_10:
I’ve long since accepted this as the fate of a
Gym Leader.
ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_01_10:
I had a feeling when I first met you, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_02_10: I sensed that we could be very good friends.
ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_03_10: I think that hunch came true.
ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_04_10: I hope you feel the same.
ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0702_01_10:
It might be fun to do what normal friends
do together.
ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0702_02_10:
For example, let’s see...
Ah yes, like going shopping.
ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0702_03_10: Yeah... That would be a lot of fun.
ch0114_00_natsume/1701_0701_01_10: I thought I’d run into you if I waited here.
ch0114_00_natsume/1701_0701_02_10:
Here, I wanted to give this to you.
I know you’ll find a use for it.
ch0114_00_natsume/1701_0702_02_10:
I knew you would. I saw a future where you
were happy.
ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0701_01_10:
People seem to think that psychic powers are
something that only a few people have, but
that’s not true. Everybody has psychic power.
ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0701_03_10:
I don’t just mean physical things you can see, like
moving an object or something.
ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0701_04_10:
Consider the power created by the love you have
for your Pokémon. I think that can be considered
a psychic power.
ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0702_01_10:
Psychic powers are a lot more commonplace than
many might think.
ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0702_02_10:
I just hope I can make people here on Pasio
understand that.
ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_01_10:
Alakazam and I are two bodies, one soul.
We share a psychic link with each other.
ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_02_10:
While it’s great that we can communicate
without words...
ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_03_10:
we can also share emotions. So when Alakazam
is sad, I get sad, too.
ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_04_10:
Alakazam and I have been through a lot. You
might even call us comrades-in-arms.
ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0702_01_10:
Feeling your Pokémon’s pain like your own can
be tough.
ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0702_02_10:
But at the same time, maybe that’s actually a good
thing when we look at it as Trainers.
ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0702_03_10:
After all, the more you share your feelings with
your Pokémon, the closer you will become.
ch0114_00_natsume/3001_0701_01_10:
Are you able to sense what sort of day lies
ahead of you? Sometimes knowing can be a
double-edged sword.
ch0114_00_natsume/3002_0701_01_10:
Hmm... It seems as though neither your heart
nor your mind are fully awake this morning.
ch0114_00_natsume/3003_0701_01_10:
Let’s visit the ocean today. Something important
awaits us there... I can feel it.
ch0114_00_natsume/3004_0701_01_10:
We’ll have a good time if we spend the day
together... I don’t need to see the future to
know that much.
ch0114_00_natsume/3005_0701_01_10:
We’ll see each other again tomorrow...
I’ve already foreseen it.
ch0114_00_natsume/3006_0701_01_10:
Night is a good time to reflect on oneself...
to focus on our inner thoughts.
